article: a karate instructor used the promise of riches to lure a group of armed men dressed as ninjas to rob and kill a wealthy florida couple while their nine special-needs children cowered or slept nearby , jurors concluded thursday .
abstract: ringleader guilty in wealthy us couple s killing
